How can Reduce Your Carbon Footprint 


Food

1. Participate in Meatless Monday
2. Choose organic and local foods 
3. Reduce your food waste
4. Eat low on the food chain
5. Buy food that is in season


Home

1. Do an energy audit of your home
2. Switch lights off when you leave the room
3. Unplug your electronic devices when they are not in use
4. Change incandescent light bulbs
5. Consume electricity and LPG gas
6. Install solar panels


Transportation

1. Drive less
2. Avoid unnecessary braking and acceleration
3. Take care of your car
4. Purchasing a hybrid or electric vehicle
5. Use bicycle and walk if possible
6. Avoid flying if possible
7. Fly nonstop
7. Go economy class
